string-array.name: pizza_titles
string-array.item: Neapolitan pizza
Detroit pizza
St. Louis pizza
Neapolitan pizza
Detroit pizza
St. Louis pizza
Neapolitan pizza
Detroit pizza
St. Louis pizza

string-array.name: pizza_descriptions
string-array.item: The typical Neapolitan pizza toppings are fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, basil leaves, oregano, and olive oil. Since Neapolitan pizza is thin, it isn\'t designed to handle the weight of too many toppings. Read more…
Detroit pizza traditionally features pepperoni, brick cheese (usually Wisconsin brick cheese), and tomato sauce. Other typical toppings include mushrooms and olives. Read more…

St. Louis pizza features Provel cheese and a sweeter tomato sauce with a hefty dosage of oregano. Because of its firm crust, St. Louis-style pizza can support several toppings of your choice. Read more…

string-array.name: cocktails_descriptions
string-array.item: The Mai Tai is a cocktail based on rum, Curaçao liqueur, orgeat syrup, and lime juice, associated with Polynesian-style settings
Classic Gin Martini Cocktail. The archetypal gin serve, the Gin MARTINI Cocktail was an icon of the 20th century, and is more popular than ever in the 21st
The mojito is one of the most famous rum-based highballs. There are several versions of the mojito

string-array.item: Chicken and chorizo jambalaya
Old Delhi-style butter chicken
Chicken madras
Chicken and chorizo jambalaya
Old Delhi-style butter chicken
Chicken madras
Chicken and chorizo jambalaya
Old Delhi-style butter chicken
Chicken madras

string-array.name: pasta_descriptions
string-array.item: Chicken and chorizo jambalaya is a Creole and Cajun rice dish of West African, French (especially Provençal cuisine), and Spanish influence, consisting mainly of meat and vegetables mixed with rice.
Old Delhi-style butter chicken is a curry of chicken in a spiced tomato, butter and cream sauce.
Chicken Madras is an Indian curry consisting of pieces of chicken in a spicy, tomato sauce.
Chicken and chorizo jambalaya is a Creole and Cajun rice dish of West African, French (especially Provençal cuisine), and Spanish influence, consisting mainly of meat and vegetables mixed with rice.
Old Delhi-style butter chicken is a curry of chicken in a spiced tomato, butter and cream sauce.
Chicken Madras is an Indian curry consisting of pieces of chicken in a spicy, tomato sauce.

Old Delhi-style butter chicken is a curry of chicken in a spiced tomato, butter and cream sauce.
Chicken Madras is an Indian curry consisting of pieces of chicken in a spicy, tomato sauce.

string-array.item: Java
Artcaffé
Java House2
Java
Artcaffé
Java House
Java House 2
Artcaffé
Java House

string-array.name: stores_descriptions
string-array.item: Java is South Africa\'s favourite chain of seafood restaurants. There\'s one near you. At Ocean Basket you\'ll find friendly people, a home-from-home feeling and great value for your hard-earned bucks. Some Ocean Baskets have a fresh-fish deli too, and you can order to eat in or takeaway, whatever grabs you.

More than a restaurant, Artcaffé is a lifestyle and a social hub in the buzzing capital of Kenya. We are firm believers that dining is about so much more than food. We combine inspirational spaces, quality products, and a sense of community to give you the full Artcaffé experience

Java House, commonly referred to as \‘Nairobi Java\’,opened its first store in 1999 at Adam\’s Arcade in Nairobi. With the aim of introducing gourmet coffee drinking culture in Kenya, the first outlet was a coffee shop and later the brand evolved to an American diner style restaurant to its present-day status as a 3 -day part coffee-led, casual dining concept
